title: Loose-Leash Basics & Leave-It 2
summary: Start leash manners indoors and add difficulty to Leave-It.

lessons.title: Loose-Leash 1 — Indoors
lessons.objective: Follow handler with slack leash inside.
steps: Take 3–4 steps; reward by your leg when leash is loose.
supportGuidelines: Use many tiny rewards at your side initially.
If pulling: stop briefly, then move when leash slackens.
lessons.safetyNotes: Avoid leash pops/jerks; keep it upbeat.

lessons.title: Leave-It 2 — Floor Temptation
lessons.objective: Back off from visible item on the floor.
steps: Place item under your foot; let puppy notice.
When puppy disengages, mark and reward from your hand.
supportGuidelines: If fixated: increase distance or value of reward.
Reward multiple times for sustained disengagement.

lessons.title: Settle on Mat — Build
lessons.objective: Increase calm duration on the mat with light distractions.
steps: Cue Down on mat; feed intermittently while calm.
Add tiny movements (sit down, step away 1 step).
supportGuidelines: If breaking: shorten duration and reduce distractions.
Use calm feeding (treats placed low on mat).
lessons.safetyNotes: Keep arousal low; avoid exciting play on the mat.
